tool_description: Maps and standardizes diagnostic codes between different classification systems (ICD-9, ICD-10, SNOMED-CT) for consistent clinical data processing.

input_codes.description: Array of diagnostic codes to be mapped

source_system.description: Source coding system: ICD9, ICD10, SNOMED

target_system.description: Target coding system: ICD9, ICD10, SNOMED

error_messages: Invalid coding system: Use ICD9, ICD10, or SNOMED for source and target systems
Invalid diagnostic codes: One or more codes are not valid for the specified source system
Mapping not available: No mapping exists between specified source and target systems
Version not found: Specified mapping version is not available
usage: Provide input_codes array with source_system and target_system specifications. Optionally set mapping_version and include_hierarchy for detailed mapping relationships.

mapped_codes.description: Array of codes mapped to target system

unmapped_codes.description: Codes that could not be mapped

mapping_summary.description: Summary of mapping results and any issues
